welcome_message_body: "Welcome to El Ghaziye, Lebanon! Get ready to be enchanted by our charming city known for its rich history, stunning architecture, and delicious cuisine. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring and experiencing all that El Ghaziye has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Beirut Rafic Hariri Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kiryat Shmona Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kiryat Shmona Airport, handling all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Masada Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for charter and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
